New Lynn Gull petrol station shooting: Junior Toleafoa jailed after shooting stranger in head https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-lynn-auckland-gull-petrol-station-shooting-junior-toleafoa-jailed-after-shooting-stranger-in-head/LQHIOPXHI5H3JJNNP6QILLGVD4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-lynn-auckland-gull-petrol-station-shooting-junior-toleafoa-jailed-after-shooting-stranger-in-head/LQHIOPXHI5H3JJNNP6QILLGVD4/ Tom DillaneThe gunman shot a stranger at a New Lynn petrol station after they exchanged words. Fri, 23 Aug 2024 07:00:00 +0000 Russell Falani Junior Toleafoa, of Mt Albert, shot a man with a rifle at close distance at the Gull Portage Rd petrol station in New Lynn on March 1, 2023. He was sentenced in the Auckland District Court on August 23, 2024.
